title: Spiked Do-si-do Milkshake Recipe
full_text:
Spiked Do-si-do Milkshake Recipe
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
5 mins
Active
10 mins
Total
5 mins
Makes
2 milkshakes
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
2 1/2
cups
vanilla ice cream
(
15
ounces
/ about
5
scoops
)
3/4
cup
smooth peanut butter
1/2
cup
whole milk
1/2
teaspoon
cinnamon
1 1/2
ounces
Frangelico
1/2
ounce
gold rum
Garnish:
Freshly grated nutmeg
Directions
Add ice cream, peanut butter, milk, cinnamon, Frangelico, and rum to blender. Purée until smooth, stopping to scrape sides of blender to incorporate peanut butter if needed. Divide among serving glasses, garnish with freshly grated nutmeg.
Special equipment
Blender
Rum
Ice Cream
